response: data privacy is an essential right for every individual. the eu's general data protection regulation (gdpr) came into force in may 2018, which ensures that individuals have control over their personal data and how it is processed. companies must comply with the gdpr to protect the data of eu citizens. it is crucial to educate people about the dangers of sharing personal information online to ensure they are aware of their rights and take necessary precautions.<|endoftext|>
